title: NexusHub Community Kick-off
description: Join us for the official launch event of NexusHub! Meet the team, learn about upcoming features, and connect with fellow community members. Food and drinks will be provided.

title: AI in Web Development Workshop
description: An interactive workshop exploring the latest AI tools and techniques for modern web development. Suitable for all skill levels. Bring your laptops!

title: Gaming Night: Retro Classics
description: Relax and unwind with a fun night of retro gaming! We'll have classic consoles and games available. Pizza and snacks included.
location: The Arcade Bar - 456 Pixel Lane, Gametown
